author: hsiaowei
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.5.0-alpha.5` -- Pincurchin -- released! 

This is the spec target for `peerdas-devnet-2`.

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.5.0-alpha.5

Test vectors: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases/tag/v1.5.0-alpha.5
